name: Time as Coordination Investigation
hypothesis: Time emerges from the necessity of ordering non-commutative operations

confidence.revolutionary_potential: Very High - if true, rewrites physics

key_insight: Time is not fundamental. Algebra is. Time emerges from non-commutativity.

implications.physics: Time not fundamental, could help with quantum gravity
implications.philosophy: Reality is informational, time is emergent
implications.computation: Time complexity relates to non-commutative orderings
